localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
blogPost.body: Kaleidoscope 2.4 features a new powerful integration with the Xcode debugger. Send any debugger command (ksp) or object (kspo) output to Kaleidoscope. This enables iterating over common development tasks quickly.
blogPost.title: Kaleidoscope 2.4 - Compare debug output. Now with Xcode integration
blogPost.author: Florian Albrecht

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特点是与Xcode调试器进行了新的强大集成。将任何调试器命令（ksp）或对象（kspo）输出发送到Kaleidoscope。这使其能够快速迭代常见的开发任务。
localize.tagline: 比较调试输出。现在与Xcode集成

localize.description: Kaleidoscope 2.4的特點是與Xcode調試器進行了新的強大集成。將任何調試器命令（ksp）或對象（kspo）輸出發送到Kaleidoscope。這使其能夠快速迭代常見的開發任務。
localize.tagline: 比較調試輸出。現在與Xcode集成

previous.excerpt: VS Code Theme Studio enables you to quickly and easily design your own VS Code theme in an intuitive, user-friendly, web-based interface. No more messing around with nasty JSON files, editing raw hex color codes, and tweaking settings.
previous.title: VS Code Theme Studio - Create your own VS Code theme easily, within your browser

localize.description: VS Code Theme Studio可以让你在一个直观的、用户友好的、基于网络的界面中快速、轻松地设计自己的VS Code主题。无需再使用讨厌的JSON文件，编辑原始的十六进制颜色代码，以及调整设置。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中轻松创建自己的VS Code主题。

localize.description: VS Code Theme Studio可以讓你在一個直觀的、用戶友好的、基於網絡的界面中快速、輕鬆地設計自己的VS Code主題。無需再使用討厭的JSON文件，編輯原始的十六進制顏色代碼，以及調整設置。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中輕鬆創建自己的VS Code主題。

next.excerpt: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
next.title: Noise and Gradient - Generate trendy textures of your own, for free

localize.description: 你知道渐变是多么时髦，但给它们添加轻微的噪点滤镜或颗粒更时髦？好了，现在你不用打开photoshop就能用自己的颜色得到这种效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免费生成您自己的时尚纹理。

localize.description: 你知道漸變是多麼時髦，但給它們添加輕微的噪點濾鏡或顆粒更時髦？好了，現在你不用打開photoshop就能用自己的顏色得到這種效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免費生成您自己的時尚紋理。
